thread.title: BRIEF-Daseke Says Under Terms Of Agreement, Daseke Will Pay C$0.90 (US$0.71) Per Share Plus Assumption Of Aveda Debt

title: BRIEF-Daseke Says Under Terms Of Agreement, Daseke Will Pay C$0.90 (US$0.71) Per Share Plus Assumption Of Aveda Debt
text:
Market News April 16, 2018 / 1:06 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Daseke Says Under Terms Of Agreement, Daseke Will Pay C$0.90 (US$0.71) Per Share Plus Assumption Of Aveda Debt Reuters Staff 
April 16 (Reuters) - Daseke Inc: 
* DASEKE TO ACQUIRE AVEDA TRANSPORTATION AND ENERGY SERVICES 
* DASEKE INC - UNDER TERMS OF AGREEMENT, DASEKE WILL PAY C$0.90 (US$0.71) PER SHARE PLUS ASSUMPTION OF AVEDA DEBT 
* DASEKE INC - IN ADDITION, UP TO C$0.45 PER SHARE IN CASH CONTINGENT CONSIDERATION TO BE PAID BASED ON EBITDA EARNINGS 
* DASEKE - AVEDA SHAREHOLDERS WILL HAVE CHOICE OF ACCEPTING CASH, EQUIVALENT IN DASEKE STOCK, OR A COMBINATION 
* DASEKE - AGREEMENT UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED BY BOTH COS’ BOARDS, INCLUDING AVEDA’S LARGEST SHAREHOLDERS, WERKLUND CAPITAL AND WERKLUND VENTURES LTD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
